name: Blood to Flesh
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You fling your blood across up to three corpses within range, taking 4 damage per corpse. This damage can't be reduced or negated. Each creature targeted is reanimated by you, returning to their maximum hit points. They take their turns after you, and follow your mental commands.

The creatures are connected to you. When they take damage, you also take half as much damage. If you are reduced to 0 or fewer hit points, all creatures reanimated by this spell disintegrate.

Casting this spell again destroys all creatures reanimated by the first spell.
empower: When your reanimated creature takes damage, reduce the shared damage by 2.
